item.description:
A member lead hike, hike 2 of the 3 Tripyramid summits, North Peak at 4180' & Middle Peak at 4140' and catch sensational views into the Sandwich Wilderness and beyond! It is just 4 miles to the first summit, with 2800' of elevation gain to North Peak. A loop hike is possible- details will follow.

Jenn R will be leading this hike and we would like to see a minimum of 3 yes RSVP's for the event to take place. Rain cancels.


Notes: Due to WMNF wilderness regulations only 10 hikers allowed per group. Due to the limited space, please do not RSVP "yes" unless you are planning on coming.



This parking location is about 7 miles East of the hairpin turn, 1 mile West of Sabbaday Falls. There is no parking lot. Legally park at the sides of the road. This is a strenuous hike with a round trip of 9.6 miles 3,450' of elevation gain in a moderate rated book time of 6 hours, 30 minutes.



Trail characteristics: Rocky, boulder climbs, & slides. Proper hiking boots and gear is mandatory. Trail will be covered with leaves so all hikers will be responsible for watching for trail blazes and junctions. Pack for fall like conditions and lower temperatures. Hike in groups and insure that no one is left behind.



Where:Pine Bend Brook Trailhead, Bartlett , NH 03812

The AMC trail description can be found here Tripyrimids via Pine Bend TH

Contact Jenn R with any questions. Carpooling is encouraged!
item.how_to_find_us: There is no parking lot. Legally park at the sides of the road
item.name: The Tripyramids North & Middle from the Kancamagus
